version_description:
1. Redesigned for iOS 7.
2. Added stop button for player. (turned off by default in the settings)
3. Added 15 seconds fast forward/rewind button for player.
4. Background download for iOS 7 (Off by default in the settings)
5. Bug fixes.

1. Newly designed music&video player.
2. Many bug fixes.

- Supports importing from cloud platforms.

- Bug fix for iOS 9

- Supports importing from cloud platforms.

- Bug fix for iOS 9

- Many iOS 10 bugs fixed
- UI improvement
